alert.note: Alert for Smyth; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 3:58AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WITH BRIEF GUSTY WINDS AND BRIEF HEAVY RAINFALL WILL AFFECT SMYTH AND TAZEWELL COUNTIES... At 356 AM EST, radar indicated showers were located along a line extending from East Bank to near Lebanon. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with these showers. Brief very heavy rainfall combined with the gusty winds may result in a few downed trees and scattered power outages. Drainage ditches may fill quickly and cause minor flooding in low-lying and normally flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Richlands... Tazewell... Saltville... Chilhowie... Cedar Bluff... Raven... and Amonate. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
